Description:
** UNDER OFFER/UNDER CONTRACT**
BOTANIC RIDGE ESTATE: Located in the prestigious Botanic Ridge Estate with lovely views to the South East, this immense family home amasses to around 49 squares and offers all of the space, comfort and luxury extras a large or growing family could ask for. Precision built by Porter Davis, this is the perfect opportunity for those looking for in-law accommodation!
Inside is equally as impressive with great natural light and quality finishes. From the double height front entry with feature lighting over hanging the staircase, you step into the vast lounge/dining room incorporating the gorgeous kitchen with stone benchtops, a walk in pantry plus stainless steel appliances including a 900mm freestanding oven/stove. There's also an adjoining rumpus room, fitted with in-built desks to make studying a breeze, plus an upstairs family room that would make a great retreat for the kids.
Accommodation is a real draw card here with 5 robed bedrooms including the ground floor master with a parent's retreat, dual walk in robes and a stylish ensuite to match the 2 upstairs bathrooms - each offering ensuite style access to the adjoining bedrooms. Extras include an enclosed study/6th bedroom, additional downstairs powder room, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and the bonus of an oversized remote 2.5 car garage complete with internal access.
Step out the back and you are bound to be impressed. Flowing from the dining area through bi-fold doors 24 Callista Street offers fantastic indoor/outdoor living spaces. The massive decked grand alfresco features built in barbecue facilities, downlights, ceiling fan and a fully fenced spa. From here you can enjoy your very own fire pit in the generous rear yard that is cleverly stepped to provide 2 flat play areas for the children to explore!
Here lies a sensational opportunity for those focused on location. Botanic Ridge is one of Melbourne's fastest growing suburbs and is only a moment's drive from a selection of primary and secondary schools, including Cranbourne South Primary, the Royal Botanic Gardens, local shops and sporting facilities. Also on offer is app. 13 kilometres of walking/bike tracks, estate family fun days with the distinguished 18 hole Greg Norman designed golf course only minutes away. It's purely a case of settling in and enjoying a relaxed environment!
